greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = A013929(a(n)), a(2n+1) = A005117(1+a(n)).
comment: This permutation entangles complementary pair odd/even numbers (A005408/A005843) with complementary pair A005117/A013929 (numbers which are squarefree/not squarefree).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4095
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: For all n, A008966(a(n)) = A000035(n), or equally, mu(a(n)) = n modulo 2, where mu is Moebius mu (A008683). [The same property holds for A088610.]
program: (Scheme, with memoizing definec-macro from _Antti Karttunen_'s IntSeq-library)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 03 2014
